Pre-Game Insights: Both teams have started their qualification campaign with a win
Wu Lei, who made history by becoming the youngest player to participate in a Chinese professional league match at 14 years and 287 days, will lead China’s attack
Son Heung-Min, who recently reassured fans after a moment of concern during World Cup qualifications, will pose the biggest threat to China
Jankovic’s decision to include the recovering Zhang Yuning in China’s lineup adds an element of suspense to the unfolding narrative
The head-to-head history favours South Korea, having won seven out of the previous twelve meetings
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match will take place at Shenzhen’s Universiade Sports Centre on November 21, 2023, at 05:30 PM (IST)
South Korea has won all six of their previous contests against China
China has lost all three of their previous encounters with South Korea
The match will be telecast in India on Sony Sports Ten 2 and Sony Liv
